Name: De La Louisiane #3
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This fruity whiskey cocktail manages to be both approachable and serious.
History: Another variation on the classic rye-based La Louisiane cocktail , first served in the early 1930s at Restaurant de la Louisiane in New Orleans, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of De La Louisiane #3 contains 152 calories
